channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dozens of Homes Burned in California, as Wildfires Rage in the West
item.description: Three fires in Southern California exploded in size overnight, and the authorities arrested a man suspected of starting one of them. Large blazes cont...

item.title: Alberto Fujimori, Ex-Leader of Peru Imprisoned for Rights Abuses, Dies at 86
item.description: During his decade in power, he revived the economy and crushed two violent leftist insurgencies. But he was forced out in a corruption scandal and lat...

item.title: Norfolk Southern fires CEO over inappropriate workplace relationship
item.description: Shaw was terminated for cause, effective immediately, after the railroad found he violated company policies.

item.title: After a Bruising Debate, Trump Finds Some Friends in Lower Manhattan
item.description: On 9/11, the former president got a warm welcome from New York City firefighters.

item.title: Israeli Strike in Gaza Kills 18, Officials Say, Including 6 U.N. Workers
item.description: While resuming its offensive against militants in the West Bank, Israel also kept up its bombardment of the Gaza Strip, striking a school building use...

item.title: GOP strategist says Trump’s false pet-eating claims at debate only hurt him
item.description: “At best, it’s a distraction,” GOP strategist to Conant said. “At worst, it reminds people of the all the craziness that comes with Trump.”

item.title: Alberto Fujimori, Ex-Leader of Peru Imprisoned for Rights Abuses, Dies at 86

item.title: Debate Puts Trump’s Affinity for Putin Back in the Spotlight
item.description: The former president’s refusal to back Ukraine’s war effort showed the likely limits of U.S. support for Kyiv if he returns to the White House.

item.title: Sanders vows contempt if CEO refuses to answer on getting ‘fabulously wealthy’ while hospitals went bankrupt
item.description: “[H]e doesn’t want to explain to the American people how horrific his greed has become," Sanders said. “Tell me about your yacht."

item.title: How Taylor Swift Surprised Harris, and Entered a New Political Era
item.description: The pop star capped a big night for Kamala Harris with an unexpectedly timed endorsement that could draw in more young voters. Ms. Swift’s political m...

item.title: Where Do Trump and Harris Stand on Israel-Gaza Conflict?
item.description: The war in Gaza merited a few scant mentions in the presidential debate. Here’s a look at where Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Dona...

item.title: Canned food identified as cause of explosion that injured 6 at state fair
item.description: Authorities said two people were hospitalized after the explosion and fire.

item.title: SpaceX Polaris Dawn Spacewalk: How to Watch the Astronauts
item.description: The astronauts of the Polaris Dawn mission, after traveling through heavy radiation and high orbits, are getting ready to open the hatch of their Spac...

item.title: Biden Says He Is ‘Outraged’ Over Killing of American Activist in West Bank
item.description: In his first extensive remarks on the death of Aysenur Eygi, the U.S. president called for accountability from Israel.

item.title: Harris and Trump’s facial expressions stole the debate
item.description: With their microphones muted unless it was their turn to speak, according to the debate rules, body language took on outsized importance for Harris an...
